goals__remit: ePRICE is the first Italian e-Commerce company. We decided to work in Italy because our country has a great potential and is the most beautiful country in the world. We sell millions of products every year, offering our clients the convenience of buying online, also through smartphones, and the opportunity to choosing among many options of delivery and payment. Our Mission is to serve the technological evolution of Italian households.
